explains: n. （书等的）原创作者，来源；作者的身份；著述业

sentences.en: Questions arise over authorship and the determination of literary heirs.
sentences.cn: 关于作者身份和文学继承人的决定产生了疑问。

sentences.en: The authorship of the poem is unknown.
The true authorship of "Mary's Little Lamb" is disputed.
sentences.cn: “玛丽的小羊羔”的真正作者是有争议的。
